reviews.text: Love this place! We drive through to Cincy frequently and usually stop here for breakfast. I always get biscuits and gravy with different flavors of mini...

The biscuits are tasty! I will come back for biscuits. We ordered the feature sammy and the quiche.

Taste: 
Quiche - won't order again. It was a texture...
Good but heinously overpriced. 6 mini biscuits with some gravy and a cinnamon roll with a coffee was ~$22. Tasted great, especially the gravy and cinnamon...
